description: Least common multiple of differences between consecutive divisors of n (ordered by size).
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
example: For n=98, divisors={1,2,7,14,49,98}; differences={1,5,7,35,49}; a(98) = LCM of differences = 245.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 24 2001
